      • getExportBeliefs

        public static boolean getExportBeliefs()
        get preference for export of beliefs
        Returns:
        true if user wants beliefs to be exported

      • getExportMailbox

        public static boolean getExportMailbox()
        get preference for export of mailbox
        Returns:
        true if user wants mailbox to be exported (included with beliefs)

      • getExportPercepts

        get preference for export of percepts
        Returns:

      • getExportGoals

        get preference for export of goals
        Returns:
        true if user wants goals to be exported

      • getExportSeparateFiles

        public static boolean getExportSeparateFiles()
        get preference for export of beliefs and goals in separate files
        Returns:
        true if user wants beliefs and beliefs in separate files

      • getOpenAfterSave

        public static boolean getOpenAfterSave()
        get preference for opening files after exporting
        Returns:
        true is user wants exported files to be opened after save.

      • getRememberLastUsedExportDir

        public static boolean getRememberLastUsedExportDir()
        check if last used directory should be remembered. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        true iff last used directory should be remembered.

      • getExportBrowsePath

        public static java.lang.String getExportBrowsePath()
        Get the path used when the user wants to export a database. Default is user's home dir as returned by System#getProperty("user.home")
        Returns:
        browse path for export. Default is user.home

      • setExportBrowsePath

        public static void setExportBrowsePath(java.lang.String newpath)
        Adjust the export browse path. This function will not correctly call back the GUI panes used in PMPrefPanel. That means that things may display incorrectly if this function is called while having the PMPrefPanel open.
        Parameters:
        newpath - is the new export browse path to be used. Should be an absolute path to a directory.
